question: ‘IndiGenomes’, that was seen in news recently, is released by the laboratories of which institution?
explanation:
The Council of Scientific and Industrial Research (CSIR) constituent labs- CSIR-Institute of Genomics and Integrative Biology (IGIB), Delhi and CSIR-Centre for Cellular and Molecular Biology (CCMB), Hyderabad carried out a study regarding Indian genomes.
As per the study published in the scientific journal, Nucleic Acid Research, 32.23% of the global variants were unique and found only in the samples sequenced from India.
